Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 85th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1968...
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1976...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 2/10/1981 (Going to HOU: C O. Virgil Jr., P D. Daboll, P G. Heimueller, P J. Price. Going to CIN: C S. Chilcott, P N. Ryan, P S. McDowell)...
Injured on 7/31/1981 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1982, off Steve Stone (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1982, off Mike McQueen (SF)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 5/21/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1985, hitting .522 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 8/17/1985...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/8/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1989, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 7/14/1989 (Going to NYM: LF L. Harris. Going to CHC: C O. Virgil Jr.)...
